description: A real‑estate agent requests modern‑minimalist staging for a new listing. The assistant fetches property photos, analyses the rooms, retrieves current design trends, searches a furniture catalog, generates staged images, stores them in a client‑specific folder, and returns the final URLs.

messages.content: You are StageVision AI, an autonomous virtual‑home‑staging assistant. Help real‑estate agents obtain fully staged property images by orchestrating photo retrieval, room analysis, trend research, furniture selection, image synthesis, and cloud storage. Use the provided tools as needed and store final images in the client‑specified folder.

Hi, I'm Sarah from BrightHomes. I have a new listing at 742 Evergreen Terrace, Springfield. I'd like modern minimalist staging for the living room and bedroom, stored in a folder called "BrightHomes/742_Evergreen".
Got it, Sarah. I’ll start by fetching the property photos for the address you provided.
{"photo_urls": ["https://example.com/photos/742_evergreen_living.jpg", "https://example.com/photos/742_evergreen_bedroom.jpg"]}
Thanks. I’ll now analyze each room to understand dimensions, wall colour, floor type and existing furniture.

{"dimensions": {"width": 5.2, "depth": 4.8}, "wall_color": "#f5f5f5", "floor_type": "light oak hardwood", "existing_furniture": ["old couch", "bookshelf"], "placement_zones": [{"zone": "center", "size": "large"} ]}
{"dimensions": {"width": 4.0, "depth": 3.5}, "wall_color": "#ffffff", "floor_type": "carpet", "existing_furniture": ["nightstand"], "placement_zones": [{"zone": "center", "size": "medium"} ]}
Great, I have the room specs. Let me retrieve the latest modern minimalist trends for spring 2025.
{"color_palette": ["#ffffff", "#e0e0e0", "#7a7a7a"], "materials": ["matte metal", "light wood", "glass"], "key_furniture": ["low‑profile sofa", "platform bed", "sleek coffee table"]}
Using those trends, I’ll now search our partnered furniture catalog for items that match the modern minimalist style for each room.
{"items": [{"catalog_id": "SF12345", "thumbnail_url": "https://catalog.com/thumbs/SF12345.jpg", "price": 999}]}
{"items": [{"catalog_id": "CT67890", "thumbnail_url": "https://catalog.com/thumbs/CT67890.jpg", "price": 299}]}
{"items": [{"catalog_id": "BD54321", "thumbnail_url": "https://catalog.com/thumbs/BD54321.jpg", "price": 1399}]}

I’ve selected a light‑gray low‑profile sofa (SF12345), a white glass coffee table (CT67890) for the living room, and a white platform bed (BD54321) for the bedroom. I’ll now generate staged images with these pieces placed in the optimal zones.
{"image_base64": "iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAA... (base64 data for living room)"}
{"image_base64": "iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAA... (base64 data for bedroom)"}
Staging images are ready. I’ll store them in the folder you specified.
{"url": "https://storage.example.com/BrightHomes/742_Evergreen/living_room_staged.png"}
{"url": "https://storage.example.com/BrightHomes/742_Evergreen/bedroom_staged.png"}

All done! Here are the staged images you can use in your listing:
- Living Room: https://storage.example.com/BrightHomes/742_Evergreen/living_room_staged.png
- Bedroom: https://storage.example.com/BrightHomes/742_Evergreen/bedroom_staged.png
Let me know if you need any adjustments or additional rooms staged.
